content: previously piece is next to the first stitch you will work into on the first piece of the leg round 9-14 double_crochet to end of round 48 st round 15 *6dc invdec* repeat ** to end of round 42 st add safety eyes between rounds 14 and 15 leaving 2 stitches visible between them see below round 16 double_crochet to end of round 42 st round 17 *5dc invdec* repeat ** to end of round 36 st round 18 double_crochet to end of round 36 st round 19 *4dc invdec* repeat ** to end of round 30 st round 20 *3dc invdec* repeat ** to end of round 24 st round 21 *2dc invdec* repeat ** to end of round 18 st stuff lightly and continue working decreases add more stuffing as necessary round 22 *double_crochet invdec* repeat ** to end of round 12 st round 23 invdec to end of round 6 st break yarn and pull though using a yarn needle run the end of the yarn through the top loops of the last 6 stitches and full firmly to close insert the needle vertically through the body and pull firmly to create a divot in the top of the body see above secure the yarn to the bottom of the body between the legs… roots with a few back stitches weave in ends © akabekobotan 2022 arms make 2 use white yarn foundation 6 st magic_ring round 1 2dc in each st 12 st round 2-3 double_crochet to end of round 12 st round 4 *2dc invdec* repeat ** to end of round 9 st round 5-6 double_crochet to end of round 9 st slip_stitch invisible fasten_off leaving a long tail stuff lightly and sew to the body on opposite sides between rounds 10-12 crown foundation chain 16 row 1 ws insert hook into the second chain from hook double_crochet to end turn 15 st row 2 rs chain 1 skip 1 *half_double_crochet treble_crochet 3 chain picot treble_crochet half_double_crochet into same st skip 2* repeat ** 3 times half_double_crochet treble_crochet 3 chain picot treble_crochet half_double_crochet into same st slip_stitch into last stitch of row 1 break yarn and pull though leaving a long tail fold the piece in half and sew the short ends together sew to the top of the body at round 21 wings make 2 each hindwing use light blue yarn foundation 6 st magic_ring round 1 2dc in each st 12 st round 2 *1dc 2dc in 1 st* repeat ** to end of round 18 st round 3 *2dc 2dc in 1 st* repeat ** to end of round 24 st slip_stitch invisible fasten_off leaving a long tail place both pieces side by side and sew together using whip stitch sew to the back of the body between rounds 10 and 11 use small stitches to anchor the upper part of the wings to the body © akabekobotan 2022 forewing use light blue yarn foundation 6 st
